input.sentences: there where paintings on all the huge windows .
the one right in the center was the main attraction .
we went outside to get a good picture of the building .
we stayed a little while to get a couple more then headed out .
output.sentences: The cathedral's gold-colored ceiling, looming high above, was elaborate.
The stained glass windows were small religious artwork bordered in black frames.
Some of these religious art pieces were of Catholic saints.
From afar, the cathedral had the appearance of a grand and ancient castle.
Having heard that it was only beautiful in the daylight, but terrifying at night, we chose to leave early.
